name: Cyberpunk sex
description:
Cyberpunk sex is a game with a lot of sex and quest elements.

You begin the game in the abandoned sex house. Only the first room is open and, in this room, already 5 characters are having sex. If you want to continue exploring other rooms, you will have to find hidden keys (sex toys) to open another rooms. This is a mysterious house, and it will surprise you on every corner. You will enjoy exploring it! You can interact with objects, switch On or Off the light, open or close doors of the furniture, flush the toilet etc.

The house has 1 floor with 10 rooms, each room contain something interesting and, of course, erotic. In every room you will see fucking couples or trios or even something more interesting. You can find sex on each step, and can easily manage it, you may change the sex pose for this or that character.

Immerse yourself in the vibrant gameplay, unlocking sexually enticing interactions that reveal the profound aspects of the characters' relationships. The gaming experience will be filled with incredibly seductive visual effects, realistic sounds, and detailed characters, making the game even more appealing.

You will see:
- Masturbation
- Hand job
- Blowjob
- Vaginal Sex
- Anal Sex
- Sex toys
…even more to explore!

In this game you will never lose, you will not get the message "Game over!" The only thing which you may see is orgasm at the end of the sex act.

So, discover this cool Cyberpunk sex house and don't stop until you open all its rooms!

Good luck!
